function_declarations.name: get_doctor_schedule
function_declarations.description: Use this tool to get the complete, unfiltered list of available appointment slots for a specific doctor on a given day. The AI should then filter this list to answer the user's specific query (e.g., for afternoon times).

doctor_name.description: The name of the doctor, e.g., 'Dr. Ahuja' or 'Ahuja'.

date.description: The desired date. This can be a natural language string like 'tomorrow', 'next Friday', or 'August 17'. The tool can parse this automatically.

function_declarations.name: book_appointment
function_declarations.description: Schedules a new appointment. If the user says 'any doctor', use 'any' for the doctor_name. The function requires the patient's email address.

doctor_name.description: The name of the doctor, or 'any' to find an available one.

patient_email.description: The patient's email address to send confirmation to.

date.description: The date of the appointment. Can be natural language like 'today' or 'Aug 15'.

time.description: The time of the appointment in 24-hour or 12-hour format, e.g., '15:00' or '3 PM'.

symptoms.description: Optional. The symptoms the patient is experiencing. This will be saved for new patients.

function_declarations.name: get_appointment_summary
function_declarations.description: Generates a summary report for a doctor. Can query by timeframes like 'today' or 'yesterday', or by any patient symptom. Can optionally be filtered by a specific doctor's name.

query.description: The summary to get. This can be a timeframe like 'today' or a specific symptom like 'cough'.

doctor_name.description: Optional. The name of the doctor for whom the summary is requested.

function_declarations.name: list_all_doctors
function_declarations.description: Provides a list of all doctors available in the system.

function_declarations.name: find_doctor_by_symptom
function_declarations.description: Use this tool first to determine the correct type of doctor (specialization) based on a user's reported symptoms.

symptom.description: The symptom the user is experiencing, e.g., 'fever', 'chest pain'.
